xml.bio:
Amogh is a senior undergraduate student at the University of Florida studying data science and mathematics. Amogh has experience working as a software engineer and data scientist through internships and part-time industry work. After graduation he plans to further develop his research experience and pursue a Ph.D. in statistics.
Previously, he researched ways to utilize Impact Network Analysis to visualize and evaluate the effect of new information in linked socioeconomic and biophysical networks.
